name: iVRy Driver for SteamVR
description: Use your iPhone or Android device as a Virtual Reality Headset for your PC. Lets you run SteamVR & Oculus Rift PC VR titles without a dedicated VR headset.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 40 MB available space
